name: 梁曉帆
objective: 此課程旨在以人為本，研究互動系統之設計與評估。使學生了解人類認知過程之理論與模式以及其工作與環境之特性，並使學生能應用設計程序與評估方法來提升系統之績效。
schedule:
Week 1: Introduction
Week 2: Understanding
Week 3: No class
Week 4: Envisionment
Week 5: Design
Week 6: Evaluation
Week 7: Task Analysis
Week 8: No class
Week 9: Visual Interface Design
Week 10: Multimodal Interface Design
Week 11: Midterm Exam 
Week 12-17: Selected Topics for Presentation and Q&A
Week 18: Invited Seminar
scorePolicy:
Mid-term Exam: 40%
Selected Topics for Presentation and Report: 30%
Discussion/Homework: 30%
materials: Designing Interactive Systems by David Benyon, 3rd. Ed., 2014, Pearson (全華)
